column1: Clear text storage of sensitive information
column2: Sensitive information stored without encryption or hashing can expose it to an attacker.
column4: This stores sensitive data returned by [["a call to param"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-312/examples/CleartextStorage.js:5:12:5:40"]] as clear text.
